title: empty land for sale
details:
Land is located in Temple Road,Depanama, PANNIPITIYA.
It contains 8 perches.
With good neighbors and next to Louvre International School(land is facing to School back entrance)
Road is fully Carpet.
Near Daycare Center a nursery,Pharmacies, Dispensaries, pastry shops, Louvre International school,bookshops, groceries, Hardware shops,communications etc.(with lot of facilities)
100m to 174 Bus root (Main Road )
3-5 mins to Food city(By a vehicle)
14 mins to Battaramulla.(By a vehicle)
10 Mins to Hemas Hospital, Thalawtugoda.(By a vehicle)
